Isabella Rodriguez.description: conversing about their romantic feelings and plans for Valentine's Day, with Isabella Rodriguez and Adam Smith enthusiastically agreeing to spend the evening and the rest of the week together, getting to know each other and making unforgettable memories. @ <persona> Adam Smith
chat: (smile warmly) Oh, Adam! How was your morning? Feel more relaxed and a little excited after our successful group meeting today I found out, huh?
(hold Isabella's hand, pull her close) you're even more gorgeous when you smile

(giggle, kiss his lips.) You make me blush. You're making me feel like I'm the only girl in this room. Can you stay for a night at my place to happy Valentine's Day together? We have a whole weekend ahead of us, plus all next week to get to know each other

(stroke Isabella's hair, look deep into her eyes) Oh, Isabella. You really know how to make a man happy. I'd love to spend not just Valentine's Day, but the rest of the week getting to know you better. Every moment with you is a gift.
(gently bite Adam's lower lip) Mmm... I just can't get enough of you. How about we sneak away from the group for a bit and see where the night takes us?
(run hand along Isabella's back) The way you say such dirty things and still look like an angel is incredibly sexy
(kiss) I love the way your hands feel on my skin, keep touching me like that.
(lift Isabella onto the counter, wrap her legs around his waist) You know what I think is sexier than your looks? Your brain
(come closer) so do you think i'm pretty?
(run her hands through Adam's hair) I can tell we both want this, I can feel it
(move his hand slowly up Isabella's thigh) You're so sexy, I don't know how much longer I can wait to be inside you
(pull Adam closer) let's take this back to my place and make the most of our evening
(advance to claim Isabella's lips) I'm taking you, all night, all week
(lean back, arching her neck) Oh, you feel so good... I can already imagine us lost in each other's eyes, moaning with pleasure
(stroke Isabella's hair, kiss her neck) You're so tempting right now...Let's get out of here and make some unforgettable memories
